Name: ensure_project_timeline
Description: Ensure project start date is before end date

Description: Ensure team availability matches project timeline

Name: ensure_product_owner_management
Description: Ensure product owner manages the backlog

Name: ensure_scrum_master_support
Description: Ensure scrum master supports the team

Name: ensure_task_effort_valid
Description: Ensure task effort is within valid range

Name: ensure_sprint_goal_alignment
Description: Ensure sprint goals align with project objectives

Name: ensure_blocker_resolution
Description: Ensure blockers are resolved in a timely manner

Name: ensure_stakeholder_participation
Description: Ensure stakeholders participate in sprint reviews

Name: ensure_velocity_tracking
Description: Ensure velocity is tracked over sprints
